cause.description:
We are not worth the flesh we are made of. We are earth's guests and we have defiantly overstayed our welcome. I guess it is time for us to leave.
1. We are an illness on this planet
2. Though Gaia is my bitch... she hates me
cause.mission: Point out that earth would be a better place without us.
cause.name: Our Planets Immune System is Trying To Get Rid of You!
